name: Snowglobe
description: Lost and alone, you awaken in a barren place, an isolated temple before you. Inside, a way out... Inspired by the point and click games of the past, Snowglobe is a virtual reality take on a familiar concept.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
